accountExistsDesc: Do you already have an account?
emailConfirmationDesc: To complete the account creation process, you must confirm your email address. We have sent a confirmation email to [email protected]. Please check your inbox and click on the confirmation link.
forgotPasswordDesc: Enter the email address to which the password reset link will be sent.
incorrectLinkDesc: We are sorry, but the link you clicked is incorrect or expired. To activate your account, please check your inbox and click on the latest confirmation link. If you have already confirmed your email address and the problem persists, please contact our support department for assistance.
sendResetPasswordEmailSuccess: An email was sent with a link to reset your password
